languages.text: At the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer gains stacks of tactical advantage equal to the number of enemies they {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} during their turn.

traits.locale_text: [draft] At the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer gains stacks of Tactical Advantage equal to the number of enemies he has {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hit{/g} during his turn.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，装备者获得“战术优势”层数，等同于本回合内{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}敌人数量。

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，装备者获得“战术优势”层数，等同于本回合内{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}敌人数量。

languages.text: В конце своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонаж получает уровни эффекта "тактическое преимущество". Число уровней эффекта равно количеству противников, получивших {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} от персонажа за его ход.
languages.original_text: At the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer gains stacks of tactical advantage equal to the number of enemies they {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} during their turn.

traits.locale_text: В конце своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонаж получает уровни эффекта "тактическое преимущество". Число уровней эффекта равно количеству противников, получивших {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} от персонажа за его ход.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時、使用者はターンの間{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}した敵の数と同等の戦術的優位のスタックを獲得する。
languages.original_text: At the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer gains stacks of tactical advantage equal to the number of enemies they {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} during their turn.

languages.text: Al final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el portador obtiene acumulaciones de ventaja táctica equivalentes a la cantidad de enemigos que {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacte{/g} durante su turno.
languages.original_text: At the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer gains stacks of tactical advantage equal to the number of enemies they {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} during their turn.

languages.text: Am Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} erhält der Träger Taktischer- Vorteil-Stapel in Höhe der Zahl der von ihm während seines Zuges {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffenen{/g} Feinde.
languages.original_text: At the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer gains stacks of tactical advantage equal to the number of enemies they {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} during their turn.

traits.locale_text: Am Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} erhält der Träger Stapel von Taktischer Vorteil entsprechend der Anzahl der von ihm während seines Zuges {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}getroffenen{/g} Feinde.

languages.text: À la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'utilisateur acquiert un nombre de cumuls d'Avantage tactique égal au nombre d'ennemis qu'il a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchés{/g} au cours de son tour.

traits.locale_text: À la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'utilisateur acquiert un nombre de cumuls d'Avantage Tactique égal au nombre d'ennemis qu'il a {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touchés{/g} pendant son tour.
